title: How do I enable GPS for determining my location?
answer: Swipe down from the notification panel, touch the GPS shortcut switch to quickly enable or disable GPS location services. If you want the navigation function to be more accurate or to use less power, go to Settings > Location access > Location mode. Choose a method for determining your location, like a method that uses Wi-Fi, mobile data networks, or GPS to determine your location. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140541) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140542)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140543) [![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=140544)]() The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
